casebody.data:
In re ESTATE OF Pauline MILLS. No. 572P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Franklin S. Hancock, Monroe, for Jerry S. Mills.

Robert D. Mills, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of February 2008 by Appellees (Greene & Tomberlin) to impose sanctions in the form of reasonable attorney's fees:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
